message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be valuable to you at a special introductory price of $900000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. We appreciate your feedback. In light of your offer, we are willing to consider $800000 as a counteroffer for our product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. Can you meet me at that price?
We understand your position, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, we are willing to negotiate further. Our counteroffer is $750000 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $725000. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We're glad to work towards a mutually beneficial agreement. Our counteroffer is $737500 for the product.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $720000. Can you meet me at that price?
We're glad to continue negotiating, Bob. Considering the value of the product to you, our counteroffer is $730000.
I'm willing to make a final offer, Alice. I'm thinking $715000 is a fair price for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
